Collection Citation

Cixi, Empress Dowager of China, Photographs. FSA.A.13. National Museum of Asian Art Archives. Smithsonian Institution, Washington, D.C.

Bibliography

Published in: The Princess Der ling, "Two Years in the Forbidden City" (facing page 148)

Genre/Form

Photographs

Scope and Contents

A reproduction taken from a print. Left front, Second Chief Eunuch Cui Yugui; Right front, First Chief Eunuch Li Lianying; Left of Cixi; Empress Longyu; far left of Cixi, Jinfei; Right of Cixi, , Fourth Princess (daughter of Prince Qing). The dog in front of Cixi is her favorite, "Sea Otter."

Collection Restrictions

Collection is open for research.
